DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate pharmacokinetics , safety tolerability dapsone adapalene follow topical administration 2 formulation dapsone/adapalene fix combination gel , dapsone 5 % gel ( ACZONE® ) , adapalene 0.3 % gel ( Differin® ) subject acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Study Dapsone-Adapalene Fixed Combination Gel Acne
DOC.criteria: Moderate acne face Willing avoid swimming study Willing avoid excessive sunlight ultraviolet light ( e.g. , tan bed ) study Willing avoid moisturizers , sunscreen , cosmetic , chemical peel study Severe cystic acne Use topical oral retinoids within 4 week Use isotretinoin within 3 month Use dapsone adapalene within 3 month Anticipated need engage activities/exercise would cause profuse sweat Donated blood equivalent blood loss within 90 day
